com.ihordev.core.navigation

Class Navigation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ihordev.core.navigation.Navigation

  • @Component
public class Navigation
extends Object

    A class for creating NavigationLink instances for site navigation (also known as breadcrumbs) for specified http request. It tries to create navigation structure from request URI string assuming that every navigation point preceding to current has request mapping to one of the requests that can be created by cutting a path segments from current request URI.

    For example, produced results, depending on request mappings, could be like this: 

       Request URI                  Navigation
   /resources                   /
                                /resources

   /resources/1/pathvar         /
                                /resources
                                /resources/1
                                /resources/1/pathvar

   /resources/1/subresources/2  /
                                /resources
                                /resources/1/subresources
                                /resources/1/subresources/2

    Each NavigationLink can be a static resource or dynamic resource. Static resource always exists and has a label with value from MessageSource. Dynamic resource, like resource with URI "/resources/1", has label with value obtained from EntityL10nService.
